output.analysis:
Let's analyze this post according to our criteria:
1. Has CMF (CMF:11240017) - Yes, this indicates it's electoral propaganda 2. Refers to candidate - Yes, mentions Marcel Ciolacu directly 3. Addresses wide population - Yes, it's a paid Facebook ad with significant reach (8,000+ impressions) 4. Electoral objective - Yes, promotes PSD's economic vision and Marcel Ciolacu's leadership 5. Journalism - No, this is clearly campaign material, not journalistic content 6. Personal opinion - No, this is an official party communication with CMF number
The post is promoting both: - Parliamentary elections (Remus Lăpușan for Chamber of Deputies) - Presidential elections (mentioning Marcel Ciolacu)
The post combines messaging for both presidential and parliamentary campaigns, which is problematic as the presidential campaign period has ended.

conclusion.electoral-propaganda-analysis: This constitutes electoral propaganda because: - Contains CMF number - Directly promotes a presidential candidate (Marcel Ciolacu) - Is a paid advertisement - Has clear electoral messaging - Reaches a wide audience (8,000+ impressions) - Is posted after the end of the presidential campaign period
conclusion.message-for-police: WEDEV NOVAT SRL și PSD Cluj-Organizatia Judeteana, pentru incalcarea articolului 55 t) din Legea 370/2004, prin difuzarea unei reclame platite pe Facebook (ID: 1655170358449919) dupa ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, care promoveaza candidatul prezidential Marcel Ciolacu. Postarea contine numar CMF (11240017), are caracter electoral explicit, promoveaza direct candidatul la presedintie si viziunea sa economica, si a avut un impact semnificativ, ajungand la peste 8000 de persoane. Materialul constituie propaganda electorala conform Art. 36(7) din Legea 334/2006, intrucat se refera direct la candidat, are obiectiv electoral si se adreseaza publicului larg prin intermediul unei platforme de social media.
